backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor that includes a blob storage mixin for backend data persistence.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features including sale submission fixes, counter updates, flexible form validation, Bangladesh flag-inspired theme colors, and UI redesigns with their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing detailed summaries of all frontend source files including components, pages, contexts, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with neutral grayscale values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag and root div that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing splash screen, registration modal, and page navigation with localStorage persistence and defensive error handling.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary class component that catches errors, logs details to console, and displays bilingual error UI with reload button.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper providing fixed bottom navigation bar with five tabs (Home, Add Sale, History, Profile, Settings) and active state styling.
frontend/src/components/RegistrationModa: Shop registration dialog with six input fields (shop name, owner name, mobile, address, type, photo) that saves data to localStorage with skip option.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Displays a splash screen with logo, app name, and tagline for 2.5 seconds before calling onComplete callback. Uses language context for translations and includes fade-in animations.
frontend/src/components/TimerDisplay.tsx: Shows a compact timer display that reads timer data from localStorage, updates remaining time every second, displays progress bar, and triggers notifications when timer completes. Expands on hover to show a clear button.
frontend/src/components/TimerModal.tsx: Modal dialog for setting a timer with hours and minutes inputs. Requests notification permission, saves timer data to localStorage, and displays success/error toasts.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides language context (English/Bengali) with localStorage persistence and translation function that retrieves nested translation keys from the translations object.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: Manages theme (light/dark) and theme color (red/green/black inspired by Bangladesh flag) with localStorage persistence and applies CSS custom properties to document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with optional Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with AuthClient integration, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable options.
Hook for managing browser notification permissions and displaying timer completion notifications with localized title and body text.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for a red-themed design system (Bangladesh flag inspired) with light/dark mode support, plus custom fade-in and scale-in animations.
frontend/src/locales/translations.ts: Translation file exporting English and Bengali (bn) language strings for the entire app including navigation, registration, sales, history, profile, settings, and timer features.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AddSale.tsx: Page component for adding new sales records with form inputs for item details, wholesale/selling prices, quantity, stock color indicators, and photo capture via camera or gallery upload, saving to localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/History.tsx: Page component displaying sales history with search and date filtering capabilities, loading records from localStorage with edit/delete actions and sorted by timestamp descending.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home dashboard page showing today's profit and sales statistics calculated from localStorage, with quick action cards for navigation and optional timer display functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile page for viewing and editing shop information (name, owner, mobile, address, type, photo) with data persisted to localStorage and toggle between view/edit modes.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page component that provides UI for toggling dark/light mode, selecting theme colors (red/green/black), switching language (Bangla/English), and enabling/disabling a timer feature with localStorage persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color system using OKLCH color space with CSS variables, custom animations (accordion, fade-in, scale-in), and extended theme properties for the UI design system.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a Smart Shop Ledger app with three-phase development plan, architectural decisions (React/TypeScript frontend, Motoko backend, Internet Identity auth), and tracking two known issues with Add Sale functionality.
